name: Mod Organizer 2
description:
This is a personal setup for installing MO2.

Its simple as hell, but this way we can have MO2, and all the bits we need for all the additional tools. i.e FNIS
notes:
Download MO2 from Nexus or Github.
This script is version independent.
Keep all install options as default.

write_file.content: Copy the installed game files in here.

files.setup: N/A:Download and select the ModOrganizer2 setup file

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Download and select the ModOrganizer2 setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Modding/MO2/ModOrganizer.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Modding/MO2/
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2019 dxvk dotnet40
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_file:
    content: Copy the installed game files in here.
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Modding/Game/Copy-game-in-here.txt
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: lutris-5.0-x86_64
